attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is not just a dual carriageway from Lewes to Polegate that is needed, but a Motorway along the whole of the south of England.
At the moment it is part motorway, part dual carriageway, part single line traffic, one suddenly going into the other. Through busy towns, etc. it is a nightmare to drive down to the west country. So how about it?

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
